dev_tax.notes: No ongoing dev tax. Treasury allocation was time-limited block reward split ending January 2022.

suspected_insider_mining.notes: Fair launch with public mining from genesis. No evidence of insider mining advantage.

fair_launch.notes: Open to all miners from genesis

emission_based_allocation.notes: Treasury received portion of block rewards July 2019 - January 2022

investors.notes: 3 accredited investors purchased 500,000 EFYT tokens on Waves blockchain at undisclosed prices. EFYT exchangeable 1:1 for ERG from treasury between July 1, 2019 - July 1, 2021. Total USD raised described as 'small amount', not publicly disclosed.

buckets.name: EFYT Community Distribution
buckets.usage: EFYT tokens distributed via bounties, airdrops, and community programs. Exchangeable 1:1 for ERG from treasury.
buckets.transparency: EFYT holders could exchange during 2-year window. 1,282,615 exchanged; 188,330 expired unclaimed.

distribution_mechanism.notes: Community members who earned EFYT through bounties/participation could exchange 1:1 for ERG

buckets.name: Ergo Foundation Treasury

multisig.notes: Foundation-controlled for ecosystem development, marketing, partnerships, and operations

buckets.usage: Ecosystem development, audits, marketing, partnerships, developer grants, infrastructure
buckets.transparency: Treasury spending tracked on-chain. $8.1M spent 2019-2024. Balance reduced from 4.33M ERG to 203K ERG (March 2025).

vesting_waterfall.source: Genesis - no immediate unlocks. Treasury released via block rewards over 30 months.
Final treasury release at 1.5 ERG/block, vesting complete January 2, 2022

notes: EFYT was a pre-mainnet fundraising token on Waves blockchain
Regulatory-compliant sale to 3 accredited investors: 500,000 EFYT
All EFYT holders had 2-year window to exchange 1:1 for ERG from treasury
No vesting or lock-ups on exchanged ERG - immediately liquid

transparency_notes: Complete transparency: 0 team allocation, 0 VC allocation at genesis
4.43% treasury only genesis allocation, released over 30 months via block rewards
EFYT investor details limited: 3 investors known, individual allocations undisclosed, price undisclosed
Current foundation holdings: 203,276 ERG (0.22% of circulating supply) as of March 2025
No ongoing vesting schedules - all allocation complete as of January 2, 2022
Fair launch model: 95.57% of supply distributed through public mining over 26 years

reasoning: Unlike Bitcoin (0% premine), Ergo allocated 4.43% to foundation for development
However, 0% went to team/founders/VCs - closest to fair launch among smart contract platforms
Treasury released slowly over 30 months, not dumped at genesis
EFYT pre-sale was minimal (0.51%) to 3 investors, rest to community bounties
95.57% of supply allocated to public miners - higher than most PoW chains
Foundation spent down treasury to 4.7% of original (203K ERG remaining)
No ongoing team/founder allocations or vesting schedules post-2022
comparison_to_fair_launch.fairness_score: 9/10 - Among the fairest launches in cryptocurrency history
